Class ScareableData

Namespace
ECCLibrary.Data
Assembly
ECCLibrary.dll

Contains data pertaining to the Scareable component. This component is what enables small fish to swim away from the player and potential predators.

public class ScareableData

Constructors

ScareableData(EcoTargetType, float, float, float, float, float)

Contains data pertaining to the Scareable component. This component is what enables small fish to swim away from the player and potential predators.

public ScareableData(EcoTargetType targetType = 2030, float scarePerSecond = 4, float maxRangeScalar = 10, float minMass = 50, float updateTargetInterval = 1, float updateRange = 100)

Parameters

targetType EcoTargetType

The target type that scares this creature.

scarePerSecond float

How fast this creature gets scared per second (maximum "fear" is 1f).

maxRangeScalar float

How far this creature can get scared.

minMass float

A creature must have this much mass or more to evoke fear.

updateTargetInterval float

Every updateTargetInterval seconds, this creature will scan the area looking for things to be scared of.

updateRange float

The creature will only be afraid if within this many meters of the player object.
